questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: During the first week of easter's holliday, i went in France for the wedding of my brother. It was absolutly amazing! My family and I where waiting for this moment so much and it was exactly like we wanted. After the wedding, a party was organised at the beach. It's seems crazy when I though that I've spend the wedding of my brother near from the see...
